name: Murder Gamemode Portable Lite
description:
Murder Gamemode Portable Lite is a famous detective game mode in which you can play a role.

Player roles:
Murderer: has to quietly kill all the bystanders.
Bystander: has to gather 3 evidence to get the gun and deal with the killer.
